name: Verify scan details are returned correctly for a valid scan ID -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch scan details for scan ID "66a3519e-8f94-43da-8be3-052ec1f5727f"
When the user receives the scan details response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for successful scan details retrieval
And the response should contain a valid "chatbot_id" of length 36
And the response should contain a "chatbot_name"
And the "creation_timestamp" should be in ISO 8601 format
And the "last_update_timestamp" should be in ISO 8601 format
And the "scan_id" should match the requested scan ID "66a3519e-8f94-43da-8be3-052ec1f5727f"

fullName: Get Scan Details using Genr3d API: Verify scan details are returned correctly for a valid scan ID

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Get Scan Details using Genr3d API
